    • Field Detail

      • name

        public String name
        The name of this gadget. It should be unique, so that the parser can unambiguously find it during parsing.

      • hidden

        public boolean hidden
        Defines whether this Gadget is initially hidden or not.
        See Also:
        Gadget.gadgetReal(aom.scripting.datatypes.string), Gadget.gadgetUnreal(aom.scripting.datatypes.string)
